title: What would happen if there were suddenly no computers, tablets or phone of any kind anywhere on Earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: What would happen if there were suddenly no computers, tablets or phone of any kind anywhere on Earth? The simple answer: Civilization collapses. Rural areas in poor countries don’t collapse quite as badly. The full answer: You may end up wishing that it was *only* ‘Civilization collapses’. WHY are there suddenly no computers? Where did they go? What made it happen? There’s several ways to approach it. First, the handwave; “Oh, ignore the laws of physics, it just happens”. OK- so the Magic Queen stops by the planet, sprinkles Magic Anti-Computer Dust on everything. Unfortunately, this dust has a side effect of turning everybody into a My Little Pony. Second, attempting to come up with a reason why. Aliens have invaded, and are taking all our computers as part of their subjugation plan. So how do they do it? How do they find them all? How do they enforce their edict and track down computers that have been hidden from them? There’s a transistor-eating bacteria. Probably going to be collateral damage, as it eats other stuff that’s similar to the silicon in transistors. If it can also eat silicon dioxide, we’re screwed….. For these “what if” problems, usually the immediate answer is nowhere near as interesting as the “and how did this happen?” issues….

The world as we know it would come to a stop. First of all power would stop flowing as most power companies use computers to regulate power flow. water would also stop since water pumps are also computer controlled. All EFI cars would stop since they can’t work without their computers, most newers planes would not respond to controls, financial transactions, calls to 911 , etc.. EVERYTHING would stop working. It would be apocaliptic in a strange way. There would be places that would have no problems with that, specially rural areas where computers are rarely found now.

Everyone Dies™ NO. Seriously. Today the whole world is automated by PCs, The banks will fail epicly. No more machines operated for keeping people alive. If you are in court or in debt no way of updating your status… I think Dave Consiglio can explain THAT ONE much better than I am.
Humanity would be forced back into a tribal, communal way of life, and humans would be forced to deal with each other again, lol.
That'd been great; I wouldn't have to worry about snoopers' attention!
